#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,k,i;
	string a;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>a;
		k=0;
		for(i=4;i<(a.length()-4);i++)
		{
			if(a[i]=='a'||a[i]=='A')
			k++;
			else
			if(a[i]=='e'||a[i]=='E')
			k++;
			else
			if(a[i]=='i'||a[i]=='I')
			k++;
			else
			if(a[i]=='o'||a[i]=='O')
			k++;
			else
			if(a[i]=='u'||a[i]=='U')
			k++;
		}
		printf("%d/%d\n",a.length()-4-k,a.length());
	}
}
